channel.title: Poke sprite recolours and splices
channel.description: Well firstly i took a charizard and recolured a celebei using its pallette and got this [IMG]http://i161.photobucket.com/albums/t231/sanga282/GameGuru/CelebiRecolour.png[/img] Then i spliced it, I suggest using Photoshop for this bit paint is too fiddly and made Celezard [IMG]http://i161.photobucket.com/albums/t231/sanga282/GameGuru/Celebard.png[/img] Rate+Comment Please :D i will take requests but they will suck lol Voltorb recolour from abra, i call it Le Voltorb Choc [IMG]http://i161.photobucket.com/albums/t231/sanga282/GameGuru/VoltorbRecolour.png[/img] Lapras Recolour [IMG]http://i161.photobucket.com/albums/t231/sanga282/GameGuru/LaprasRecolour.png[/img] Lapzard [IMG]http://i161.photobucket.com/albums/t231/sanga282/GameGuru/Lapzard.png[/img] Scizor Recolour [IMG]http://i161.photobucket.com/albums/t231/sanga282/GameGuru/ScizorRecolour.png[/img] Kecleon Recolour [IMG]http://i161.photobucket.com/albums/t231/sanga282/GameGuru/KecleonRecolour.png[/img] Aeroleon [IMG]http://i161.photobucket.com/albums/t231/sanga282/GameGuru/Aeroleon.png[/img] Camerupt Recolour [IMG]http://i161.photobucket.com/albums/t231/sanga282/GameGuru/CameruptRecolour.png[/img] Me making the camerupt [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=z8tLODWZt54]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=z8tLODWZt54[/url] Dragonite Recolour [IMG]http://i161.photobucket.com/albums/t231/sanga282/GameGuru/DragoniteRecolour.png[/img] Lunite [IMG]http://i161.photobucket.com/albums/t231/sanga282/GameGuru/Dragonleon.png[/img] I was thinking of chopping the wings and replacing them with bigger ones but i dunno Pika recolour [IMG]http://i161.photobucket.com/albums/t231/sanga282/GameGuru/PikachuRecolour.png[/img] Pika-no-tail [IMG]http://i161.photobucket.com/albums/t231/sanga282/GameGuru/PikaNo-tail.png[/img] Pikablu [IMG]http://i161.photobucket.com/albums/t231/sanga282/GameGuru/Pikablu.png[/img]
